src_original: buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṅghaṃ ca triratnaśaraṇaṃ vraja //
etad buddhakule ramye saṃvaraṃ bhavate dṛḍham //
vajraṃ ghaṇṭā ca mudrā ca tvayā grāhyā mahāmate //
yad bodhicittaṃ tad vajraṃ prajñā ghaṇṭā iti smṛtā //
saddharmaṃ ca tvayā grāhyaṃ guhyaṃ triyānikam //
saṃvaraṃ sarvasaṃyuktaṃ parigṛhṇīṣva tattvataḥ //  pūjākarma yathāśaktyā mahākarmakuloccaye //
prāṇinaś ca na te ghātyā adattaṃ naiva cāharet //  nācaret kāmamithyāyāṃ mṛṣā naiva ca bhāṣayet //
akriyāṃ varjayet sarvāṃ sattvārthaṃ vinayena ca //  sādhūnām upatiṣṭheta yogināṃ paryupāsanam //
trividhaṃ kāyikaṃ karma vacasā ca caturvidham //  manasā triprakāraṃ ca yathāśaktyānupālayet //
hīnayānaspṛhā naiva sattvārthaṃ vimukhaṃ na ca //
apamānaṃ na te kāryaṃ devatā na ca guhyake //
na ca cihnaṃ samākramyaṃ mudrā vāhanam āyudham //
